page.title: 20BEDLINGTON AREA COURIER-Pt 3
page.content: There are several regular advertisers and features in the Courier.The most obvious of the advertisers are estate agents such as Wallhead Gray and Coates, Louis Johnson, Rickard and Keith A Pattinson.Garages also advertise extensively e.g. W M Elliot & Co. Ltd and Lion Garage. A list of the weekends TV programmes is always included as well as classified advertisements under various headings.Job vacancies and a public For Sale section are other regular features.A home improvement guide/advertisement is also included. {************************************** The people who prepared these twenty pages are all members of class 3 one at West Sleekburn Middle School, Bedlington, Northumberland .Class members also did the block surveys and chose the slide subjects.
